price: 99. Lorsque la mort vient à l’un d’eux, il dit : « Seigneur, renvoie-moi sur terre !
arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءَ أَحَدَهُمُ ٱلۡمَوۡتُ قَالَ رَبِّ ٱرۡجِعُونِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: ḥattā idhā jāa aḥadahumu al-mawtu qāla rabbi ir'jiʿūni
